layman_description: Number displayed on items showing stack quantity (e.g., 47 bullets).
technical_description: Text label rendering item stack count in inventory grid cells.
player_impact: Know exactly how many of each item you're carrying at a glance.

layman_description: Condition bar showing how worn your weapons and armor are.
technical_description: Durability tracking system for equipment degradation and repair status.
player_impact: Repair gear before it breaks and becomes useless in combat.

layman_description: Icons differentiating 9mm, shotgun, arrows, and other ammo types.
technical_description: Ammunition classification icons displayed with ammo stacks.
player_impact: Quickly identify what caliber ammo you're looking at.

layman_description: Items that drop from specific zombie body parts you harvest.
technical_description: Loot container for harvested zombie parts and biological components.
player_impact: Find rare crafting materials by harvesting zombie limbs.

layman_description: Visual bar showing how much longer a craft will take.
technical_description: UI progress indicator for ongoing item crafting and production.
player_impact: See how long until your crafted items are ready to use.

layman_description: 3D model rotation letting you inspect items from all angles.
technical_description: 3D viewer system for rotating and examining item models in detail.
player_impact: Appreciate the detail of weapons and armor before equipping them.

layman_description: Clock icon showing how long until a buff/debuff expires.
technical_description: Visual timer indicator for temporary status effects on character.
player_impact: Plan to reapply buffs before they wear off in combat.

layman_description: Special section for quest items that can't be dropped or sold.
technical_description: Inventory category for quest-related items with transaction restrictions.
player_impact: Find quest items without them getting lost among regular inventory.

layman_description: Quick button to consume multiple items rapidly (healing or food).
technical_description: Rapid-fire consumption system for healing potions and food items.
player_impact: Heal up quickly in emergency situations without menu delays.

layman_description: Indicator showing if an item is light, medium, or heavy to carry.
technical_description: Weight category classification affecting total inventory encumbrance.
player_impact: Plan load-outs knowing which items slow you down most.

layman_description: Badge showing which character perks unlock better equipment.
technical_description: Perk requirement indicator displayed on locked equipment tiers.
player_impact: See which perks you need to unlock better crafting recipes.

layman_description: Pre-packed supplies for expeditions including food and medicine.
technical_description: Inventory bundle system for quick expedition loadout assembly.
player_impact: Pack supplies for journeys quickly without manually collecting items.

layman_description: Alert when you assign the same hotkey to multiple items.
technical_description: Input validation system preventing duplicate hotkey assignments.
player_impact: Avoid confusion from accidentally assigning same hotkeys to different items.

layman_description: Star or highlight system marking your most-used items.
technical_description: Favoriting system sorting marked items to top of inventory lists.
player_impact: Always have your favorite weapons and tools at the top of lists.

layman_description: Symbol showing magical properties on special weapons and armor.
technical_description: Visual indicator of enchantment properties applied to items.
player_impact: Spot enchanted gear and understand their bonus effects.

layman_description: Collection of ores and metal components ready for smelting.
technical_description: Inventory category for smelting resources and forge materials.
player_impact: Organize ore and metal components for bulk forging sessions.

layman_description: Accept vendor trade offers with summary of what you get.
technical_description: Confirmation dialog for trading items with NPC merchants.
player_impact: Complete trades and get what you agreed to in a single click.

layman_description: Category headers grouping related items (all ammo, all food, etc).
technical_description: Inventory section headers for collapsible category grouping.
player_impact: Collapse item categories to reduce visual clutter.

layman_description: Badge showing weapons with high critical strike chances.
technical_description: Critical hit probability indicator on weapons.
player_impact: Choose weapons that match your critical hit build.

layman_description: Limited items from special events or seasonal activities.
technical_description: Inventory category for time-limited event and seasonal items.
player_impact: Keep exclusive seasonal items organized and visible.

layman_description: UI for haggling with merchants to improve trade prices.
technical_description: Trading negotiation system with success probability for price modification.
player_impact: Haggle for better deals if you have relevant perks.

layman_description: Save and restore inventory loadouts in case of death or mistakes.
technical_description: Inventory snapshot system allowing restoration of previous states.
player_impact: Recover lost items if you die and respawn at base.

layman_description: Armor badge showing poison and disease resistance level.
technical_description: Status effect resistance indicator on equipment pieces.
player_impact: Choose armor that protects you from specific hazards.

layman_description: Crafting recipes you've learned organized by craft station.
technical_description: Unlocked recipe inventory filtered by crafting location and type.
player_impact: See all recipes available at your current workstation.

layman_description: In-game notes you write to remember item values and locations.
technical_description: Item system for creating and storing player-written inventory notes.
player_impact: Leave yourself notes about valuable items and trading deals.

layman_description: Empty slot on weapons where you insert gems or special components.
technical_description: Modular socket system for inserting enchantments and gem items.
player_impact: Enhance weapons by inserting special gems and components.

layman_description: Icon showing bonuses for wearing matching armor sets together.
technical_description: Equipment set bonus indicator appearing when full set is worn.
player_impact: See bonuses you gain from completing matching armor sets.

layman_description: Visual marker showing items infected or contaminated with disease.
technical_description: Hazard flag system marking contaminated items requiring decontamination.
player_impact: Identify infected items before they spread disease to you.

layman_description: Verification showing which modifications can attach to your weapon.
technical_description: Compatibility checking system validating attachments before equipping.
player_impact: See what mods work with your weapons before wasting resources.

layman_description: Track item values over time to sell at best prices.
technical_description: Historical price tracking system showing item value trends.
player_impact: Sell items when prices are high instead of at market bottoms.
